title: Dragon Mural at Sunrise
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed 2D Anime illustration, official art style, a young female street artist seen from behind, painting a massive fantasy mural on a textured red brick wall during golden hour dawn, ultra-wide shot (16:9). The artist wears a paint-splattered white hoodie and dark pants, hair tied in a messy bun. The mural depicts a majestic silver oriental dragon soaring through a pastel pink and purple sky above serene floating islands adorned with vibrant pink cherry blossom trees, overlooking a calm ocean horizon. Cinematic lighting, soft shadows, visible god rays streaming from the rising sun behind the distant city skyline. Scattered art supplies, paint cans, brushes, an open sketchbook, and a steaming coffee mug on a side table on the concrete sidewalk. Detailed urban environment, lo-fi aesthetic.
